intro: Nauclea esculenta, commonly known as the African coffee tree, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical Africa and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant produces small, fleshy fruits that contain seeds, and it is often found in woodland and savanna habitats. Nauclea esculenta is also valued for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
